forecast.name: Today
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain and snow before 4pm. Cloudy. High near 38, with temperatures falling to around 30 in the afternoon. West wind 8 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: From the park website: Bucks Run is currently closed.  Snow is currently being made for Bucks Run and construction will being in the coming weeks. The golf course trails, Coyote Run and Hawk Hills, along with Cedar Trace were rolled December 9, 2025.  No additional grooming has taken place.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Please access the XC trails from Valley road during snowmaking. The upper trails are groomed and in great shape.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob is closed today so that we can concentrate on snowmaking. We will be open daily beginning Friday, December 12. The Snow Crew is making rapid progress and we plan to have all of the frontside and southside runs open this weekend which will bring our run count to over 30 runs. Pintail Peak will open by the following weekend. Thanks for skiing at Nub's Nob.
